name: Optional. The name of the validator, by default it is the address
description: Optional. A description of the validator
website: Optional. The website of the validator.
address: NQXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX
logo: Optional. A base64 encoded SVG logo. By default identicon is used.
accentColor: Required if logo is set. The brand color of the validator. Hex color code. e.g. '#1f2348'. Default to identicon background color.
payoutSchedule: Optional. The payout frecuency of the validator. Any string is valid. e.g: 'Daily', 'Twice a day'

contact.email: Optional. The email of the validator
contact.telegram: Optional. The telegram handle of the validator
contact.twitter: Optional. The twitter handle of the validator
contact.discordInvitationUrl: Optional. The discord invitation url of the validator
contact.bluesky: Optional. The bluesky handle of the validator
contact.github: Optional. The github handle of the validator
contact.linkedin: Optional. The linkedin handle of the validator
contact.facebook: Optional. The facebook handle of the validator
contact.instagram: Optional. The instagram handle of the validator
contact.youtube: Optional. The youtube handle of the validator
